```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(scholar)
library(tibble)

# Define the id for Soeren Petersen

# Get publications from Google Scholar
publications <- scholar::get_publications(id) |> tibble::tibble() |> dplyr::arrange(desc(year))

formatted_publications <- format_publications(id, "Petersen, S.")

formatted_yield_pred_publication <- formatted_publications[grep("Yield prediction", formatted_publications)]

```
